resources.string: You will get notifications at the exact time for the next dose and other doses till the last dose.
Take an oily or fatty snack or meal after every dose! Take lots of water or juice throughout and shortly after completing this regimen (to prevent drug side-effects)

Taking a fatty/oily meal with this drug helps with quick absorption into your blood, prevents it from staying in your stomach or intestine and causing constipation or diarrhea or headache or a combination of these three symptoms
Do not take this drug with Vitamin C or fruit juice!
Use every dose halfway through a meal(oily/fatty) NOT BEFORE, NOT AFTER
Using it with a meal prevents the drug
Do not take drug with Vitamin C or fruit juice
The Viva experience is amazingly side-effect free!

Purchase Coartem (Arthemeter/ Lumefantrin) or any substitute
(Lumaterm, Coartal etc) at your local pharmacy
Use the first dose anytime between 7am and 10am.
These start times are strongly advised because taking the first dose anytime before 7am and beyond 10am causes subsequent doses to fall at uncomfortable times like midnight or 3am.
Select your drug and click YES in the prompt that shows up.
Open up Viva not more than 10 minutes after taking the first dose
Please, take one tablet of x now!
Take an oily or fatty snack or meal after every dose! Take lots of water or juice throughout and shortly after completing this regimen (to prevent drug side-effects)

Taking a fatty/oily meal with this drug helps with quick absorption into your blood, prevents it from staying in your stomach or intestine and causing constipation or diarrhea or headache or a combination of these three symptoms
Do not take this drug with Vit. C or fruit juice!
Do not take Vitamin C after meal
